Posts.Content: On 2/28/2007 Hana24 wrote: My mom is currently going through chemo again do to recurrent BC. We were told that she will loss her hair again. The problem is that she lost her only wig that was given to her by a friend. I heard there expensive!!  Does anyone know where i could get one thats ok in price. I live in Atl, GA if that helps.  Thanks Hi, Try looking up locks of love on line they should be able to help you or direct you to a cancer center that takes care of the cosmetic effects, and often they help with the financial burden as well, or they can hook you up with an agency that will. Alot of patients that have wigs dont wear them though as they say they are just to hot, and there are many other options in head dress now that are also more cost effective. Good luck Shawna
